document.full_text: nearly nine years after elizabeth smart was abducted from her bed, a judge ordered a street preacher to life in prison for raping her while holding her captive for months.
document.title: rockies: utah: street preacher gets life sentence for abduction
lines_and_colors: nearly nine years after elizabeth smart was abducted from her bed, a judge ordered a street preacher to life in prison for raping her while holding her captive for months.
